thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Binary Sale Technology Announces Data King's Offer To Buy All Shares Of Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Binary Sale Technology Announces Data King's Offer To Buy All Shares Of Co

organizations.name: brief-china binary sale technology announces data king

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - China Binary Sale Technology Ltd :
* ANNOUNCES CASH OFFER BY FIRST SHANGHAI SECURITIES LTD TO ACQUIRE ALL ISSUED SHARES IN CHINA BINARY SALE TECHNOLOGY LTD
* TOTAL CONSIDERATION FOR SALE SHARES IS HK$50.9 MILLION, EQUIVALENT TO HK$0.5 PER SALE SHARE
* ‍APPLICATION MADE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN SHARES FROM 18 JAN 2018​
* DATA KING AS OFFEROR INTENDS TO FINANCE CONSIDERATION FROM LOAN FACILITY; LOAN FACILITY FOR SUM OF UP TO HK$80 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
